page_content: The page contains various news and updates related to administrative and governmental activities in the Kanton Bern.
The page discusses insurance premiums for free provision (Säule 3b) aimed at financial security in old age, death, and disability.
The page reports on Covid-19 cases at the Reha Klinik Schönberg in Gunten, detailing the measures taken for patients and staff.
The page provides information on qualifying participations in capital companies or cooperatives and their tax implications.
The page discusses the recounting of votes for a federal referendum held on November 24, 2002, due to potential irregularities.
The page provides information on tax adjustments related to the sale of business properties in the Kanton Bern.
The page provides information on how to claim tax deductions for costs related to disabilities in the Kanton Bern.
